docs.text:

docs.title: ⛏️ Development
docs.text:
• Weights & Biases - Train and fine-tune models, manage models from experimentation to production, and track and evaluate LLM applications.

  • Pytorch - An open-source machine learning library based on the Torch library.

  • LLaMA-Factory - A WebUI for Efficient Fine-Tuning of 100+ LLMs (ACL 2024)

docs.title: 📍 Demo
docs.text: • Gradio - Build and share delightful machine learning apps, all in Python.

docs.title: 🏹 Inference
docs.text: • Ollama - Get up and running with large language models.

docs.title: 🗡️ Others
docs.text:
• DeepSpeed - DeepSpeed is a deep learning optimization library that makes distributed training and inference easy, efficient, and effective.

  • vLLM - A high-throughput and memory-efficient inference and serving engine for LLMs.

  • UnSloth - Finetune Llama 3.1, Mistral, Phi & Gemma LLMs 2-5x faster with 80% less memory.

docs.title: 🗄️ Server Related
docs.text: • nvtop - GPU & Accelerator process monitoring for AMD, Apple, Huawei, Intel, NVIDIA and Qualcomm.
